Excellent (40): Problem is clear, compelling, well-researched; audience understands urgency and market opportunity
Good (32): Problem is clear and meaningful; good market research; minor gaps
Satisfactory (24): Problem stated but research is thin; reasoning could be stronger
Needs Work (16): Problem vague; limited market research or understanding

Excellent (40): Excellent customer research; realistic WTP estimates; supported by data/interviews; market size justified
Good (32): Good customer insights; reasonable WTP; adequate market sizing
Satisfactory (24): Basic market analysis; some customer data; rough estimates
Needs Work (16): Minimal market analysis; weak demand justification

Excellent (40): Solution elegantly solves problem; clearly differentiated; feasible and innovative
Good (32): Solution addresses problem well; competitive advantage clear; realistic
Satisfactory (24): Solution addresses problem; some competition acknowledged; feasibility questions
Needs Work (16): Solution somewhat unclear; competition not well understood

Excellent (40): Rigorous cost, revenue, profit analysis; correct elasticity calculation; sophisticated modeling; sensitivity analysis
Good (32): Accurate economic calculations; good cost and revenue model; proper profit analysis
Satisfactory (24): Economic analysis present; calculations mostly correct; basic modeling
Needs Work (16): Economic calculations have errors; incomplete analysis

Excellent (40): Polished, professional presentation; clear communication; compelling visuals; audience engaged; excellent delivery
Good (32): Well-organized presentation; clear messaging; good visuals; solid delivery
Satisfactory (24): Adequate presentation; generally clear; some visual issues; acceptable delivery
Needs Work (16): Presentation disorganized or unclear; weak visuals; delivery issues
